parameters: \n<\n[2]>You've had a long day, why don't you head home and rest?

\n<\n[3]>Well then, see you today,
looking forward to working with your lady again, hehe.

setBalloonLoop 2 0
\n<Yamashita>Hello, citizen. Are you here to accept the commission?
I need to know the details of the mission first.
What are the benefits for us in solving the task?
I need to know the details of the mission first.
\n<Yamashita>It's just some cleaning tasks.
I can't reveal too much before you accept.
What are the benefits for us in solving the task?
\n<Yamashita>The stability of the entire safe zone...
and of course, some resources belonging to you personally.
OK, I accept
Are the safe zones understaffed?
OK, I accept
Are the safe zones understaffed?
\n<Yamashita>Are you the survivors who just left home?
Looks like you guys are the lucky ones who escaped the safe zone cleanup, huh\|
\n<Yamashita>Although the cleanup was carried out relatively smoothly,
However, as the control range of the safe zone expanded and the defensive line lengthened,
We are encountering more and more infected, and the difficulty of exploration is also increasing\|
\n<Yamashita> Compared to major issues like safety and intelligence,
The opening of a bar...is not necessary \|
\..\..Opening a bar in the first place was already crazy enough.
\n<Yamashita>But simply closing the bar might not be enough to effectively keep out the infected.
So it's necessary to investigate the sewers, but right now we don't have any extra exploration team members.
Currently, carrying out a search mission is a good option for acquiring supplies and intelligence...
Even though it's a bit dangerous, it's better than doing nothing...\|
good I accept mission
good I accept mission
Phone.AddMessage("avabook", "Main Quest-3", 72)
\n<Yamashita> Not bad, brave citizen.
Everything from the sewer exploration belongs to you.
I will grant each explorer a reward of 200D for their efforts, \|
\n<Yamashita>Unfortunately, the equipment at headquarters is also running low. We can only give you these items.
You can keep this equipment for yourselves afterward.\|
\n<Yamashita> Also, this citizen had already signed up for this operation before you guys\..\..\..
Mr. Inoshita, please come in.
A
\n<Yamashita>Be careful, citizen.
Told Yamashita about the investigation process.
\n<Yamashita> I see, the shopping district...
\n<Yamashita>I never expected that the zombies in the sewers came from the shopping district.
Zombies are unlikely to open manhole covers by themselves.
It's probably the other group of survivors in the shopping area making a move...
\n<Yamashita> We still don't have enough resources to clear out the zombies in the shopping district.
According to previous investigations, the living conditions of humans over there are far from optimistic.
Don't understand who is making trouble\|\|
\n<Yamashita> But we figured out the situation.
The bar should be able to open now.
Just have some people keep an eye on a few of the sewer entrances\|
\n<Yamashita> Ah, as for your reward, it certainly won't be insufficient.
Take it, this is what you deserve.
\n<Yamashita>And this one,
You can use it later to participate in the investigation over at \c[17]the shopping district.
\n<Yamashita> You have already proven your capabilities,
There will be more tasks later.
You better continue to participate as a team \|
\n<Yamashita> There will be more missions afterwards that you can participate in together.
<balloonLoop:1>
setBalloonLoop 2 0
\n<Yamashita>Hello,\n[1]
You proved your strength in the last mission.
Do you want to participate in further exploration action?
\n<Yamashita>Of course, it's still the same trio.
The reward is just as generous.\|
wanna know the mission details
wanna know the mission details
\n<Yamashita>The shopping district you explored last time—
That’s probably where the zombies breaking into the safe zone came from.
\n<Yamashita>Go check out the commercial street and see who’s causing trouble.
Accept mission
Never mind
Accept mission
\n<Yamashita>Alright, this task is quite dangerous.
So, you’ll be teaming up with Mr. Inoshita again, just like last time.
He’s got a solid build—he’ll definitely be useful to you guys.\|
\n<Yamashita>Remember, every time you want to start an exploration mission,
you need to contact your teammates first.
I might even be able to provide some supplies.
\n<Yamashita>Now, you could say the mission is officially yours.
If you need to restart it, check in with me again \C[17].\|
Never mind
\n<Yamashita> Is that so? Being cautious is good, but if we don't venture out to explore,
No one knows how long the situation in the safe zone can last.
\n<Yamashita> Let me know whenever you have an idea.
\n<Yamashita>Shall we start executing the mission?

\n<Yamashita>Let me see, it's night-time now,
Please wait until daytime to accept the exploration quest.
It's still too dangerous outside the safe zone at night\|
\n<Yamashita> Hmm? It seems the lady isn't here.
When you plan to undertake the exploration mission, please bring your wife to the headquarters.
After all, I can't reach her.
No
\n<Yamashita>Feel free to approach me anytime you want to execute a mission.
\n<Yamashita>I wish you success on your mission.
Told Yamashita about the investigation process.
\n<Yamashita> As we expected, the shopping district is controlled by local thugs.
And they even... raised some zombies.
\n<Yamashita> This information wasn't discovered even after I sent several exploration teams.
\n[1], your team can certainly be considered elite now.
\n<Yamashita> Since you have already established contact with the shop street residents
We'll need you for the next exploration mission as well.
However, before that, I will modify and formulate exploration tasks based on your information\|
\n<Yamashita> This is your reward. Sorry, the organization isn't very well off either.
There are no exploration missions until the next plan is completed.
If you have some free time, you can participate in some \c[17]daily quests and exploration missions\|
\n<\n[2]>I'm tired from today's exploration, so let's head home and rest.
Um
Um
\n<\n[3]>We had a great collaboration today, especially with you, ma'am, hehe
\n<Yamashita> I plan to send the right people to further engage with the shopping district residents.
You guys should just focus on your own tasks for the time being.
<balloonLoop:1>
setBalloonLoop 2 0
\n<Yamashita>\n[1], you've arrived
\n<Yamashita>Sorry, I forgot to give this to you yesterday.
\n<Yamashita> Based on the last intelligence, I plan to send someone during this period.
Contact the survivors in the shopping district.
\n<Yamashita> Perhaps we can persuade them to collaborate with us.
Overthrow the rule of the Wild Dog Gang
\n<Yamashita> Once everything is sorted out, I'll contact you for a new exploration mission.
These days, just use this membership card and spend some time on the first floor of the \c[17] headquarters\|
\n<Yamashita>If you have some free time, you might as well do some gathering quests.
\n<Yamashita> Once everything is properly handled, I'll contact you for a new exploration mission.
The member area is just below on the right side of the first floor, you can check it out first.
\n<Yamashita>If you have some free time, you might as well take on some collection tasks.
<balloonLoop:1>
setBalloonLoop 2 0
\n<Yamashita>\n[1], you’ve arrived.
\n<Yamashita>With the intel you provided,
I sent some people to talk with the residents of the shopping street
who were willing to resist the Wild Dogs gang.
\n<Yamashita>These residents wanted to collaborate with us to overthrow the Wild Dogs
and be included in the management of the safe zone.
\n<Yamashita>But... someone must have tipped off the Wild Dogs about their plan.
The gang immediately released the zombies they had been keeping...
Killing some of the rebels and our people.
\n<Yamashita> Now, the shopping street is crawling with zombies.
We’ve suffered heavy losses,
making it difficult to clear them out.
\n<Yamashita>You’re one of the elite teams in the safe zone.
Would you be willing to go out and suppress the zombies to ensure stability?
\n<Yamashita>The situation is dire. This time, once you accept the mission,
head straight to the shopping street.
\n<Yamashita>By the way, there’s one more thing I need to remind you about...\..\..
This task is very dangerous, I advise you to prepare \c[2]antibiotics\c[0] in advance.
If the shop is open, then \c[17] go to the shop and buy. \|
\n<Yamashita>\c[2]Antibiotics\c[0] are very precious,
There is no surplus stock within the organization either.
Accept mission
Hold on
Accept mission
\n<Yamashita>\n[1],You truly are a trustworthy explorer!
I'll contact Inoshita right away, and you all set off as soon as possible.
\n<\n[3]>I'm here, I will definitely protect the lady~

[3]>Of course, there's also Mr.

\n<Yamashita> There's no time to waste in exterminating the zombies.
Please have your team set out as soon as possible.

\n<Yamashita> Although the situation is urgent,
going to fight zombies at night is still too dangerous.

\n<Yamashita>\n[1]!
Have your wounds healed up enough?
\n<Yamashita>Sorry, these past two days,
I've been busy coordinating the actions on the shopping street, neglecting to greet.
\n<Yamashita> We also don't have extra manpower to deliver these to you,
Please accept these supplies now.

setBalloonLoop 2 0
\n<Yamashita>Speaking of the shopping district, you came back just in time...
During the two days you were injured, I managed to eliminate most of the zombies rampaging in the area,
along with some of the more defiant gang members.
Only a few gang remnants and their leader, Inukai, remain.
\n<Yamashita>I suspect Inukai and his men have already fled the shopping district.
But my men are still busy clearing out the remaining threats there.
We need a small elite team to track down Inukai...
\n<Yamashita>Inukai shouldn’t have gotten far. Time is of the essence.
I know your wounds have just healed,
but I have to ask you to head out again and hunt him down.
Would you like to take on the exploration quest?
Accept mission
Hold on
Accept mission
\n<Yamashita>\n[1], you are indeed the most reliable explorer in our organization.
I will contact Inoshita right away, and you should set off as soon as possible.
\n<\n[3]> Is it time to go rat hunting?
No worries, taking down the weak is something I excel at~
\n<Yamashita>Though Inukai fled in defeat, he’s still quite formidable.
\n[3], It’s best not to underestimate the enemy, sir.
\n<\n[3]>I heard he had quite a few girlfriends before.
I wonder if bringing them back would let me have some fun, hehe
\n<\n[2]>\..\..\..Mr. Inoshita,
can we focus on the mission briefing seriously?

[3]>Ah, sorry, sorry, 
[2] Ma’am, don’t be mad!
How could those women compare to you?
I’m just kidding, just kidding...
\n[2] Seems a bit mad...
\n<Yamashita>\..\..We initially suspect that
\c[17]Inukai may have used the secret passage in the warehouse\c[0]
and fled into the mountains and forests near the shopping district.
\n<Yamashita>During this exploration mission, aside from capturing Inukai,
we also need to scout and assess the situation in the mountains and forests.
To that end, I will provide you with excellent equipment.
\n<Yamashita>The sooner we capture Inukai, the better.
Please gather your team and head out immediately.
With \n[2] and Inoshita,
we quickly arrived at the shopping street...
\n<Yamashita> Although the situation is urgent,
exploring at night is still too dangerous.
Please wait until daylight to accept exploration missions.
\n<Yamashita> Hmm? It seems the lady isn't here.
When you want to undertake the exploration mission,
please bring your wife to headquarters.
After all, I can't reach her.
Hold on
\n<Yamashita> Inukai could escape at any moment.
Please get ready as soon as possible!
\n<Yamashita>\n[1], you have excellently completed the task once again!
\n<Yamashita>Thank you, we managed to make contact with the people in the shopping district.
And finally resolve the threat posed by Inukai.
\n<Yamashita>Although I really want to reward you,
The repair of the shopping street area that follows
Will use up a lot of our supplies
\n<Yamashita>\n[1],Please allow me to grant you the
priority access to the shopping street as a token of appreciation for this task.
You can trade at Bargain Street for the best prices.
\n<Yamashita> The repair of the shopping street has also been put on the agenda,
This way, the safe zone can accommodate more refugees from Sancang City.
Ask Inukai about doubts regarding Yamashita.
Getting ready to go home
Ask Inukai about doubts regarding Yamashita.
\n<Yamashita>Oh?
\..\..\..So Inukai said he once worked for me?
\n<Yamashita>I'm sorry, that did happen.
During the first week after the safe zone was established,
I once considered joining forces with the Wild Dog Gang
to co-manage the entire safe zone, including the shopping street.
\n<Yamashita>But Inukai took pride in the fact that the Wild Dog Gang was made up entirely of young men.
Believing their combat skills were far superior to us ordinary citizens,
they broke away and formed their own faction,
ambitiously trying to seize control of the safe zone’s resources.\|
\n<Yamashita>I'm sorry again for not mentioning this earlier.
I just didn’t want irrelevant details to cloud your judgment.\|
Getting ready to go home
\n<Yamashita>By the way, \n[1]
Next, I need to head to the shopping street to oversee the repair work there.
Might not return to the safe zone for a while.
\n<Yamashita> It seems our collaboration will have to be put on hold for a while...
But don't worry, I believe your chance will come soon.
In this situation, gathering information and acquiring resources require reliable explorers\|
\n<Yamashita> Anyway, if you want to see me for anything else,
I'll be at the \c[17]shopping street\c[0].
Take a good rest during this time.
\n<\n[3]>Next time,
don't arrange these tasks where we have to fight and kill living people...
Is the mission at the safe zone coming to an end...
Anyway, let's just head home for today...

There's a letter on the table...
\n[1], when you see this letter
Trust me, things will be over soon.
I apologize for keeping things from you in various matters earlier.
But now we can only choose to cooperate again\|
After my investigation yesterday...
At the moment, neither of us have obtained the most crucial data\|
To access this data, you need a data key and Suzuki's retinal scan authentication.
The data key has been taken by you, and the items needed for Suzuki's authentication...
In other words, his retina is in my hands.
You, your wife, and Inoshita,
You are the only ones in Mikura City who know the truth\|
With data, I can at least ensure the survival of the you\|
But in my personal opinion, the fewer people who know about these things, the better.
It's your freedom to keep the information only between you and your wife...
Maybe \..\..\.. can still improve your chances of survival\|
Accept my proposal?
Just come to the underground garage of the Mikura Biotech Company.
Let's cooperate to get the data\|
Actually,
We don't have any other choices for each other\|
A
In the end, we still have to work with Yamashita...
Yamashita doesn't seem to care about our situation with Sato...
He only cares about the results.
And indeed, we did as he said,
There's no other way...
Regarding the intel, let's go home and discuss it with \N[2].
Should we tell Inoshita about the cooperation with Yamashita...?

If you want to make a decision, you need to have a good talk with her...
\..\..If you want to talk about this, when \N[2] is present,
